select wid, wantedTitle, active, startDate, endDate, vcnt, cid, detail, jobType from wanted_t where wid = #{wid}

mapper.delete: delete from scrap_t where uid = #{uid} and wid = #{wid}
mapper.insert: insert into wanted_t(wid, wantedTitle, active, startDate, endDate, cid, detail, jobType) values(#{wid}, #{wantedTitle}, #{active}, from_unixtime(#{startDate}), from_unixtime(#{endDate}), #{cid}, #{detail}, #{jobType})
update wanted_t set wantedTitle = #{wantedTitle}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, detail = #{detail}, cid = #{cid}, jobType = #{jobType} where wid = #{wid}

mapper.update: update wanted_t set vcnt = vcnt + 1 where wid = #{wid}
